title: The Runeteera Map is amazing
body:
So I explored the map indepth for the first time today, just wanted to say I was not expecting to actually enjoy reading on a virtual map. I loved the little Ezrael stories the most (was kinda pissed off when I read the one near Icathia where he just stops exploring any further, like come on I really want to know whats there), the art for Icathia was also amazing, massive black looking creatures towering over an army.

Im primarily a Noxus fan so all I wanted to do was look around that main region but I ended up looking at all of them except Demacia (because Demacia can go to hell, go Noxus), loved Zaun;  Chemtech is apparently cheap and dangerous Hextech. I loved Urgots whole story. 

I found bandle city after 10 minutes of searching, wasnt much of a story there.

If anyone knows where I can find Aatrox and Tryndamere Id love to hear it cause I didnt find those two. 

Also Darius had a campagian against the Freljord that ended in a stalemate, would **LOVE** to read a story about that, I was looking for Tryndamere for that specific reason (Thought maybe Darius and Tryndamere clashed).

 On the note of Aatrox, expanding on Darkins would also be amazing as well as on the shadow isle. Would also be cool if more animals where added, I loved reading about Drakehounds and the beasts around Mount Targon (probably because im a biologist :D).

Anyway, cool stuff Riot lore team {{sticker:vlad-salute}}

replies.body: To be fair, not every bit of lore is always available on the map. so as of right now we prob got the Neeko/Nidalee points of interest in Kumungu but some of the Ryze marks are missing and so on. Tryndamere can only be found when clicking on Freljord, Aatrox should be listened as Shuriman. Also, it is constantly getting updates whenever new short stories, new champs and reworks come out. Most lore fans are happy by that map and who is not interested in the lore...can play and just ignore the map cause it barely changes anything

> except Demacia (because Demacia can go to hell

Funny you say that. Have you seen the Demacian Throne Room recently? 
https://images-ext-2.discordapp.net/external/Sxsu_hCrIfDrREbiIyyC6VpYm0b7_EL9XWrFvSJnsKc/https/pbs.twimg.com/media/DwASnwuW0AUv1cq.jpg%3Alarge
PS: that and some others images in the Demacia page are a teaser to the new champion and something really big coming for Demacia.

The narrative department hasnt had the opportunity to give Bandle city and general Yordles any lore updates yet. Just so you understand why there's nothing much about them. They should get lore eventually, and 2019 has only just begun.

> The narrative department hasnt had the opportunity to give Bandle city and general Yordles any lore updates yet. Just so you understand why there's nothing much about them. They should get lore eventually, and 2019 has only just begun.

Bandle is hinted to get its update this year. Probably with either a Corki rework or a new champion entirely.

Yeah well, people had thought there were good "hints" in times before. 

Yes, we know Bandle content has been in a state of active development fora very long time. Its been apparently bubbling up with each passing year, to no avail. At this point, I wouldn't believe it was coming until a new Yordle champ or rework is actually confirmed.
Where is this map of Runeteera with stories included exactly?
